Posts.Content: I pressed my Doctors till they did something. I had and MRI to determine lymphedema. Mcgees womans hospital has a specilist in this area and has trained physcial therpist on what to do. I have been to others that only work on this maybe once a year and they said they would have to get back to me, but the centers for rehab is great I have seen improvment in just a couple of weeks. I hope this gives you hope.
Posts.Title: Lymphedema, in glands under the breast
